edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator
Class KSServerWorker

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.KSServerWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class KSServerWorker
extends java.lang.Thread

A KSServerWorker provides the functionality to service a client. This worker conforms to the protocol agreed to by this worker and the client. This worker handles verification of the connection as well as streaming the server data needed by the client for playback.

                      java.net.Socket socket,
                      java.lang.String workerID,

Constructor - Initializes a new KSServerWorker

Parameters:
frame - a reference to the local simulator
socket - a Socket object that is connected to a client.
workerID -
TXStatus - the initial transmit status of this worker
server - a reference to the local server
Method Detail

startTransmission

protected void startTransmission(java.lang.String name,
                                 long interval)
Tell this KSServerWorker to begin transmission immediatly.

stopTransmission

protected void stopTransmission()
Tell this KSServerWorker to stop transmitting. The connection will remain open and a call to startTransmission will begin transmission to the client once again.

terminate

protected void terminate()
Tell this KSServerWorker to terminate the connection with the client.

public void run()
